amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2255, under the order of 8/3/2021, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 20 - 78. Record Vote Number: 295.

action.text: Amendment SA 2255 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 2137. (consideration: CR S5689-5690; text: 8/2/2021 CR S5649-5661) In the nature of a substitute.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2255 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 2137.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2255, under the order of 8/3/2021, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 20 - 78. Record Vote Number: 295.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2255, under the order of 8/3/2021, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 20 - 78. Record Vote Number: 295.
